attributes.action: force tax exiles to repay the cost of their education and health; and any other tax-funded service from which they have benefited while living in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax exiles are perfectly willing to benefit from tax-funded services while their own incomes are low enough to pay tax at only the minimum rate.  As soon, however, as their income (usually from an activity, such as sport or the media, which hardly benefits society at all!) grows to a level at which they become liable to pay the higher rate (which is only 40% anyway!) off they go to a tax haven where they can avoid paying for others to have services similar to those they themselves have benefited from!  This may not be illegal but it's certainly immoral!
